content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains various variations of mature content. Such as:
Scenes depicting violence (Blood, fights, , violence), scenes depicting age-restricted substance use (Alcohol, Smoking), and obscene scenes (Naked girls, flirting scenes, sex scenes)
The game may also contain scenes that involve topics not suited for the sensitive audience, such as sex scenes and alcohol abuse.

Please, note that all characters in the game are 18 age or older.

All sexual acts in the game are consensual.
